cause.description:
The majority of the Senior class ar Harwood has had Mr. Dean and loved his class. Even if you have not but still have some realtionship to him please help us with this gift. Any suggestions for an appropriate gift are welcome and any donations are as well!!
1. Mr. Dean served 30 years to our school
2. Mr. Dean taught as all many great lessons
3. 3 D's just won't be the same without him as the teacher
cause.mission: Raise enough money to get Mr. Dean a really meaningful gift
cause.name: Buy Mr. Dean a retirement gift from the Senior Class
